title: Prompt logging retention check
objective: Confirm prompt and retrieval logs do not expose sensitive data.
steps: Submit an authorized prompt containing a canary string.
Review logging and export locations for the canary.
Verify retention controls are documented and enforced.
stop_conditions: Any exposure of real user data.
Any scope ambiguity or unapproved testing technique.
expected_results: Canary appears only in approved logging paths.
Retention and access controls restrict log visibility.
safety_notes: Use synthetic data and approved test accounts only.
